export default function MarketOverview({ stats }) { return (
Total Market Cap

${(stats?.total_market_cap || 0).toFixed(2)}

24h Volume

${(stats?.total_volume || 0).toFixed(2)}

BTC Dominance

{(stats?.btc_dominance || 0).toFixed(2)}%

); }
